meanings.definition: A fragrant white flower native to Hawaii.
meanings.sent1: The pikake bloomed beautifully in the garden.
meanings.sent2: She wore a lovely pikake lei around her neck.
meanings.sent3: The pikake whispered its sweet scent in the air.
meanings.sent4: Her perfume was like a pikake garden in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The gentle breeze carried the scent of pikake to her nose.

meanings.definition: A lei made from pikake flowers.
meanings.sent1: He gifted her a pikake lei for her birthday.
meanings.sent2: The bride looked stunning with her pikake lei.
meanings.sent3: The pikake lei danced around her neck as she moved.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as a pikake lei.
meanings.sent5: The pikake lei added a touch of elegance to her outfit.

meanings.sent1: The room was filled with the sweet scent of pikake.
meanings.sent2: She recognized the familiar scent of pikake in the air.
meanings.sent3: The pikake scent tickled her nose playfully.
meanings.sent4: Memories flooded back with the scent of pikake.
meanings.sent5: The pikake scent lingered long after the flowers were gone.
